Will grow in less than a day: Will grow in less than a day
blockdesc-strawmat-*: A straw mat made from reed fibers woven through straw
fieldsofgold:block-handbooktext-strawmat: Straw mats are made by interacting with a Haystack using cooper's reed or papyrus fibers.
fieldsofgold:block-handbooktext-hay: An effective mobile storage method for large batches of grass. Created by using a rope on a haystack. Can be placed and cut with a knife to turn back into grass. Will not return the rope.
fieldsofgold:hivewrongseason: It's the wrong season for swarming
fieldsofgold:item-handbooktext-drygrass: Can be stacked to start a haystack with ctrl+shift.
fieldsofgold:haystacktoofewfibers: You need more cattail or papyrus fibers to make a straw mat
fieldsofgold:blockhelp-haybale: Breaks haybale and returns {0} dry grass
